short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: E-commerce Payment Gateway. We aid in managing online transactions and amplify sales with easy-to-use and impactful solutions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser extension is the perfect solution for entrepreneurs and online stores. It allows for invoicing customers and real-time order status tracking. 

It integrates directly with acquiring banks and meets PCI DSS requirements for secure transactions. 

Features include accepting payments through various channels, bulk payouts to contractors, and a referral program for business expansion. 

Easy to install and use, this extension turns your browser into a powerful financial management tool for your business.
